data.title: NOLA Celebrity & Music Tour – 2nd line tours
data.text:
Step right up, folks, and let me tell you about the hottest tour in New Orleans – the Nola Celebrity & Music Tour! Get ready to groove through the heart and soul of this vibrant city as we journey through the birthplace of Jazz and Bounce.We will explore the roots of the New Orleans Rap and Hip-Hop scene.

We’ll whisk you away on a magical ride through iconic neighborhoods in Uptown, like Hollygrove, Central City and the Garden District, where the rhythm of the streets will have your feet tapping in no time. Explore historic Back-0-Town and legendary venues like The Dew Drop Inn, where the spirits of Ray Charles, Little Richard, Marvin Gaye, James Brown and Tina Turner still linger in the air.

There’s more! Dive deep into the roots of New Orleans music culture. Feel the energy of the city’s rap and bounce scene as we trace the footsteps of Grammy-winning iconic artists and entertainment Moguls and let’s not forget about the silver screen! Get a glimpse into New Orleans’ cinematic history as we showcase scenes filmed right here in the Big Easy.

And here’s the cherry on top, folks – as we cruise through the city, you’ll have the chance to grab a refreshing New Orleans signature drink!

So come on, “Babby”! Join us “ya heard meh”? This tour will have you singing and dancing in the streets. It’s a celebration of the timeless legacy of New Orleans’ iconic music scene, and you won’t want to miss a beat..

Discover iconic video locations that have played a starring role in Cash Money Records’ legendary music videos, including the unforgettable scenes from “Baller Blockin’,” “I Got the Hook Up,” “Back That Thang Up,” “Bling Bling,” and many more! Experience the sights and sounds that have shaped the vibrant music scene of New Orleans and make memories that will last a lifetime. Join us for an unforgettable journey through the iconic streets of the Big Easy.
